Log ComponentsÔÉÅ

Log component is a useful feature of ns-3 to filter out unwanted debug information during execution. In this project, each object has its own homonymous log component, except for scenarios which have a unique log component named Scenario.

Note

Beware that additional components are available, but are provided by ns-3 authors. Please read their documentation for more information.
